ValidationRule.description: REQ0998943 - Make Resolution Result Mandatory when a case is closed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Bypass_Data_enforcement__c = FALSE && ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed") && NOT(ClosedBySystem__c) && ( $User.ProfileId != '00e90000001eeTh' && $User.ProfileId != '00e90000001PfHp' && $User.ProfileId != '00e90000001eeTi' && $User.ProfileId != '00e2v000002Tyb5' ) && ISBLANK(TEXT(Resolution_Result__c)) && OR( CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "SSSW"), CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, 'Unified') ) && NOT(ISNEW()) && ISPICKVAL(Account.ServiceSLA__c, "Enterprise")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must populate the Resolution Result before you can close the case
